FuncDef: When the system sends a VPN-IP Route-Refresh to a peer it sets all the VPN-IP routes received from that peer (in the RIB-IN) to stale and starts the purge-timer. If the routes are not updated (refreshed) before the purge-timer has expired then the routes are removed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum time before stale routes are purged. Values-1 to 60.
